page.title: 01GENERAL REVIEW OF THE AREA
page.content:
There were many different aspects in our area of study. The area included a mining element as two collieries, Florence and Hem Heath were in our patch. Other industry in our area included the Wedgwood factory at Barlaston and a trading estate with many different industries at Newstead.
We also chose to look at the religious life of the area and the institutions concerned with health and welfare of members of the community. We looked at education in the area by looking at Blurton High School.
Finally there was also a farming component in our area involving Cocknage farm and Crowcroft poultry farm.
